weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy. What am I?

hints.text: ☃️ You can make a snowman with me.

weather.question: I help flowers grow, and I come down from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I come.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I blow through the trees, and I can move your hair. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make the leaves dance.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I am air that is moving.

weather.question: I am dark and grey, and I bring the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I'm often seen before a storm.
☔ You might need an umbrella when I'm around.

weather.question: I'm colorful and appear after the rain. You can see me in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ The sun has to be behind you to see me.
✨ People say there is gold at my end.

weather.question: I am frozen rain, and I can be small or big. Sometimes I hurt when I fall. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ I usually fall during a thunderstorm.
⚽ Sometimes I am as big as a marble.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spins around. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You should stay inside when I'm near.
🌪️ I have a name like a person.

weather.question: I am a white mist that makes it hard to see. I often appear in the morning. What am I?

hints.text: 👻 I can make things seem spooky.

weather.question: I am very hot and dry weather that lasts for a long time. Plants and animals struggle when I visit. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 The ground can crack and get very dry.
🥵 It is important to drink lots of water.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?
I have a shell and move very slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.

ocean.question: I am a fish with bright colors and I can be found in a reef. What am I?
I'm a very large animal with a fin on my back and I breathe air. What am I?
I can be found on the beach, sometimes I have a little sea creature living in me. What am I?

hints.text: 👂 You can sometimes hear the ocean when you hold me to your ear.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can also squirt ink! What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can change color to hide.

ocean.question: I am a place where many colorful fish and other sea creatures live, and I'm made of coral. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of tiny animals homes.
🐠 I'm very important for ocean life.

ocean.question: I am a very large, strong current of water flowing through the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I can carry warm water to colder places.
🧭 Sailors use me to travel faster.

ocean.question: I am a slow moving creature, flat, with a hard shell on my back and swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs on the beach.
👵 I can live for a very long time.

ocean.question: I'm a very large, powerful predator that swims in the ocean. Some people are afraid of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🎬 You might have seen me in a movie.
